page.title: 06Farming.
page.content: The farmers rely on their cars for transport and telephone for communications.Some said that they were the things that had helped farmers and their wives the most in the last fifty years. They made life much easier. Shopping is done in Knighton, though a few special items have to be bought further afield where there is more choice. They find their entertainment in Knighton or on Television. The nearest public houses are at Knighton, Bleddfa, Llangunllo and Lloyney. Churches and Chapels of most denominations are also within two or three miles of the area. The farmers were happy where they were living.
